text: $:/tt
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/config/tt-conf-prefix
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-col-id-enabled()
<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column!!tt-col-id-enabled" type="match" text="enabled" default="disabled">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="col-id" tag="input" placeholder="column-id" />
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column!!tt-col-id-enabled" type="nomatch" text="enabled" default="disabled">
{{$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-id}}
</$reveal>
\end

\define tt-column-order()
<$select tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="tt-column-order" default="">
<$list filter="""[list<tt-conf>]""" variable="tt-current-column">
<option><<tt-current-column>></option>
</$list>
<option value="" selected="selected">place at the end</option>
</$select>
\end

<!----------------------------
-- "Column properties" dialog
-->

|Column ID|<<tt-col-id-enabled>>|
|Column label|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="col-label" tag="input" placeholder="Column Label" />|
|Column data view|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="tdView" tag="input" />|
|Column data edit|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="tdEdit" tag="input" />|
|Column header view|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="thView" tag="input" />|
|Column header edit|<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="thEdit" tag="input" />|
|Column position|<<tt-column-order>>|
|Column hidden|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" index="tt-hidden" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="false" />|
|noBorder|k
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/column-properties-dialog
subtitle: Column properties
footer: <$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-id" type="nomatch" text=""><$button message="tm-close-tiddler" actions=<<tt-set-column-properties>> >{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</$button></$reveal><$button message="tm-close-tiddler">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" text="" /></$button>
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!--------------------------
-- "Delete selected" control
-->
<$button>
Delete selected
<$action-deletetiddler $filter="""[tag<tt-name>selected[true]]""" />
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/delete-selected
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!------------------------
-- "Edit selected" control
-->
<$button>
Edit selected
<$list filter="""[tag<tt-name>selected[true]]""">
<$list filter="""[list<tt-conf>] -[list<tt-list-hidden>]""" variable="tt-col-id">
<$action-setfield $field=<<tt-col-id>> $value="tdEdit" />
</$list>
</$list>
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/edit-selected
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-hidden-state() $(tt-col)$##tt-hidden <$set name="tt-hide-show-qualifier" value=<> > <$set name="tt-hide-show-state" filter="""[[$:/state/tt/]] +[addsuffix]""" > <$button popup=<> > Hide/show columns <$reveal type="popup" position="below" state=<> >
<<< <$list filter="""[list]""" variable="tt-col-id"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <$checkbox tiddler=<> index="tt-hidden" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="false"> <$transclude tiddler=<> index="col-label"/> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="true" default="false"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="tt-hidden" $value="false" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tt-list-hidden" $subfilter="""-[]""" /> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="true" default="false"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index="tt-hidden" $value="true" /> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $field="tt-list-hidden" $subfilter=<> /> <<<
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/hide-show-col
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!--------------------
-- "New column" control
-->
<$button>
New column
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/column-properties-dialog" tt-conf=<<tt-conf>> tt-name=<<tt-name>> tt-set-column-properties=<<tt-set-column-properties>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" type="application/x-tiddler-dictionary" text=<<tt-new-column-defaults>> tt-col-id-enabled="enabled" />
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/new-column
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-raw-id() $(tt-name)$/$(id)$

<!---------------------
-- "New record" control
-->
<$set name="id" value=<<now "YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ss">> >
<$button>
New raw
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-raw-id>> type="application/json" />
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tt-raw-id>> $tags="""[<tt-name>]""" />


<$list filter="""[list<tt-conf>] -[list<tt-list-hidden>]""" variable="tt-col-id">
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-raw-id>> $field=<<tt-col-id>> $value="tdEdit" />
</$list>
<$list filter="""[list<tt-list-hidden>]""" variable="tt-col-id">
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-raw-id>> $field=<<tt-col-id>> $value="tdView" />
</$list>

</$button>
</$set>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/new-raw
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!----------------------
-- "New table" controls
-->
<$button set="!!tt-new-table" setTo="show">
New table
</$button>

<$reveal state="!!tt-new-table" type="match" text="show">
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-table" tag="input" size=10 />

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!tt-new-table" setTo="hide">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt-new-table" text="" />
</$button> 

<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-table" type="nomatch" text="">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!tt-new-table" setTo="hide" actions=<<tt-new-table-actions>> >
<small>{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</small>
</$button>

</$reveal>
</$reveal>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/new-table
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!-----------------------
-- "Open table" controls
-->
<$button set="!!tt-open-table" setTo="show">
Open table
</$button>
<$reveal state="!!tt-open-table" type="match" text="show">
<$select field="tt-name">
<$list filter="""[removeprefix<tt-conf-prefix>] +[removeprefix[/]] +[splitbefore[/]] +[removesuffix[/]]""">
<option><<currentTiddler>></option>
</$list>
</$select>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!tt-open-table" setTo="hide">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
</$button>
</$reveal>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/open-table
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!----------------
-- "Reset" control
-->
<$button>
Reset
<$list filter="""[tag<tt-name>]""">
<$action-setfield selected="false" />

<$list filter="""[list<tt-conf>] -[list<tt-list-hidden>]""" variable="tt-col-id">
<$action-setfield $field=<<tt-col-id>> $value="tdView" />
</$list>

</$list>
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/reset
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<!--------------------
-- "New table" control
-->
<$button>
New table
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/table-properties-dialog" tt-conf=<<tt-conf>> tt-name=<<tt-name>> tt-set-column-properties=<<tt-set-column-properties>>/>
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/table-config
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
Change column properties
<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/column-properties-dialog" tt-conf=<<tt-conf>> tt-name=<<tt-name>> tt-set-column-properties=<<tt-set-column-properties>>/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-col>> title="$:/temp/tt/new-column" />
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" $index="tt-column-order" $value={{{[list<tt-conf>after<tt-col-id>]}}} />
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/tthm-properties
creator: )+(auloop

text:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
Sort by this column
</$button>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/controls/tthm-sort
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-display-controls()
<$list filter="""[tag[$:/tags/ttControl]]""" variable="tt-control">
<$transclude tiddler=<<tt-control>> />
</$list>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/display-controls

text:
\define editDate()
<$edit-date index=$(tt-col-id)$ />
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!$(tt-col-id)$" setTo="tdView">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/edit-date
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define editVal()
<$edit-text index=$(tt-col-id)$ tag="textarea"/>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!$(tt-col-id)$" setTo="tdView">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/edit-val
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define inputVal()
<$edit-text index=$(tt-col-id)$ tag="input"/>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!$(tt-col-id)$" setTo="tdView">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/input-val
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-new-column-defaults()
tdView:<<showVal>>
tdEdit:<<inputVal>>
thView:<<tt-head-menu>>
thEdit:
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/new-column-defaults
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-conf-new() $(tt-conf-prefix)$/$(tt-name-new)$

\define tt-new-table-actions()
<$set name="tt-name-new" value={{$:/temp/tt/new-table}}>
<!-- $set name="tt-conf-new" filter="""[<tt-conf-prefix>] +[addsuffix[/]] +[addsuffix<tt-name-new>]""" -->
<$set name="tt-conf-new" value=<<tt-conf-new>> >

<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-conf-new>> list="tt-select tt-open" tt-select="thView" tt-open="thView" />

<$list filter="""[<tt-conf-new>] +[addsuffix[/tt-select]]""">
<$action-setfield type="application/x-tiddler-dictionary" text=<<tt-select-column-defaults>> />
</$list>

<$list filter="""[<tt-conf-new>] +[addsuffix[/tt-open]]""">
<$action-setfield type="application/x-tiddler-dictionary" text=<<tt-open-column-defaults>> />
</$list>

<$action-setfield $field="tt-name" $value=<<tt-name-new>> />
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-table" text="" />

</$set>
</$set>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/new-table-actions
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-open-column-defaults()
tdView:<<openThis>>
tdEdit:<<openThis>>
thView:
thEdit:
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/open-column-defaults
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define openThis()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
<small>{{$:/core/images/open-window}}</small>
<$action-navigate/>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/open-this
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-select-column-defaults()
tdView:<<selectThis>>
tdEdit:<<selectThis>>
thView:<<selectAll>>
thEdit:<<selectAll>>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/select-column-defaults
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define selectThis()
<$checkbox field="selected" checked="true" unchecked="false" />
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/select-this
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define selectVal()
<$select index="$(tt-col-id)$">
<$list filter="""[tag<tt-col>]""" variable="tt-select-opt">
<option><<tt-select-opt>></option>
</$list>
</$select>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" set="!!$(tt-col-id)$" setTo="tdView">
<small>{{$:/core/images/close-button}}</small>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/select-val
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-set-column-properties()
<$set name="nc" value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-id}} >

<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-label" type="match" text="" default="">
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" $index="col-label" $value=<<nc>> />
</$reveal>

<$set name="tt-column-before" value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##tt-column-order}}>
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tt-conf>> $field="list" $subfilter="""+[insertbefore:tt-column-before<nc>]""" />
</$set>

<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column##tt-hidden" type="match" text="true" default="false">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tt-conf>> $field="tt-list-hidden" $subfilter=<<nc>> />
</$reveal>

<$reveal state="$:/temp/tt/new-column##tt-hidden" type="nomatch" text="true" default="false">
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<tt-conf>> $field="tt-list-hidden" $subfilter="""-[<nc>]""" />
</$reveal>

<!-- $action-listops $tiddler=<<tt-conf>> $field="list" $subfilter=<<nc>> / -->
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tt-conf>> $field=<<nc>> $value="thView" />

<$list filter="""[<tt-conf>] +[addsuffix[/]] +[addsuffix<nc>]""">
<!-- $action-setfield type="application/x-tiddler-dictionary" text=<<tt-new-column-defaults>> / -->
<!-- $action-setfield type="application/x-tiddler-dictionary" caption={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-label}} / -->
<$action-setfield $index="col-id" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-id}} />
<$action-setfield $index="col-label" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##col-label}} />
<$action-setfield $index="tdView" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##tdView}} />
<$action-setfield $index="tdEdit" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##tdEdit}} />
<$action-setfield $index="thView" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##thView}} />
<$action-setfield $index="thEdit" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##thEdit}} />
<$action-setfield $index="tt-hidden" $value={{$:/temp/tt/new-column##tt-hidden}} />
</$list>

<$list filter="""[tag<tt-name>]""">
<$action-setfield $field=<<nc>> $value="tdView" />
</$list>

</$set>
<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tt/new-column" text="" />
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/set-column-properties
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define showTags()
<$list filter="[<currentTiddler>tags[]sort[title]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop"/>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/show-tags
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define showVal()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="text-align: left;" set="!!$(tt-col-id)$" setTo="tdEdit">
<$wikify name="val" text={{##$(tt-col-id)$}} output="html"><<val>></$wikify>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/show-val
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define table-tool(tt-name, tt-layout:"default", tt-controls:"show")
<$vars tt-name="""$tt-name$""" tt-layout="""$tt-layout$""" tt-controls="""$tt-controls$""">
{{||$:/plugins/mau/TableTool/templates/table-template}}
</$vars>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/table-tool
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-head-menu() <$set name="tt-head-menu-qualifier" value=<> > <$set name="tt-head-menu-state" filter="""[[$:/state/tt/]] +[addsuffix]""" > <$button popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$(tt-col)$##col-label}} <$reveal type="popup" position="below" state=<> >
<<< <$list filter="""[tag[$:/tags/ttHeadMenu]]""" variable="tt-head-menu-item"> <$transclude tiddler=<> />
<<<
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/th/head-menu
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define selectAll()
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible">
<$checkbox field="select-all" checked="true" unchecked="false" />
<$reveal state="!!select-all" type="nomatch" text="true">
<$action-setfield select-all="true"/>
<$list filter="""[tag<tt-name>]"""><$action-setfield selected="true"/></$list>
</$reveal>
<$reveal state="!!select-all" type="match" text="true">
<$action-setfield select-all="false"/>
<$list filter="""[tag<tt-name>]"""><$action-setfield selected="false"/></$list>
</$reveal>
</$button>
\end
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/th/select-all
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-plugin() $:/plugins/mau/TableTool
\define tt-raw() $(tt-plugin)$/templates/raw-template
\define tt-conf() $(tt-conf-prefix)$/$(tt-name)$/$(tt-layout)$
\define tt-list-hidden() $(tt-conf)$!!tt-list-hidden
\define tt-col() $(tt-conf)$/$(tt-col-id)$
\define tt-mode-filter() [<currentTiddler>regexp:$(tt-col-id)$[^th.*]]

\define tt-conf-prefix() {{$(tt-plugin)$/config/tt-conf-prefix}}
\define tt-mode() {{!!$(tt-col-id)$}}

<!-- this variables have to be wikified: """<$wikify name="macro" text=<<macro>> >""" -->
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/macros/variables
creator: )+(auloop

text:
\define tt-show-column()
<$(tt-mode-tag)$ style="position:relative;"><$transclude tiddler=<<tt-col>> index=<<tt-mode>> /></$(tt-mode-tag)$>
\end

<tr>
<$list filter="""[list<tt-conf>] -[list<tt-list-hidden>]""" variable="tt-col-id">
<$wikify name="tt-mode" text=<<tt-mode>> >
<$set name="tt-mode-tag" filter=<<tt-mode-filter>> value="th" emptyValue="td">
<<tt-show-column>>
</$set>
</$wikify>
</$list>
</tr>
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/templates/raw-template
creator: )+(auloop

text: <$importvariables filter="[tag[$:/tags/ttMacro]]"> <$wikify name="tt-conf-prefix" text=<> > <$set name="display" filter="""[enlist] -[[show]]""" value="" emptyValue="tt-display-controls"> <$macrocall $name=<> /> <$tiddler tiddler=<> > <$scrollable> <$transclude tiddler=<> /> <$list filter="""[tag]""" template=<> />
title: $:/plugins/mau/TableTool/templates/table-template
creator: )+(auloop
